title: Doubt in Assignment 1 Q3
content: I have a doubt in question 3 related to hypothesis testing. Should we use t-test or z-test?

title: Doubt in Assignment 1 Q3
content: You should use t-test since population variance is unknown.

title: Clarification on Project Submission
content: Can we submit the project after deadline with penalty?

title: Clarification on Project Submission
content: No, late submissions are not allowed as per project rules.
